MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-OCT-2020 14:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Cromwell Street, Leeds Street, and the surrounding area. We are aware of the previous power cut affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:41 pm on 13th October, 2020.
